title: Works fine, but there's room for improvement
comment: Thank you for a nice client. It does crash occasionally and has some bugs which are known in pumpiverse already. Hope you'll continue the effort - so far it's visually the best pump.io client I've seen.

title: Yet, I still have problems
comment: It's good-looking. It seems reliable. Yet,the tablet version is buttonless. It's very hard to control or even operate. Even if I tried once to use it via browser, the browser itself would have crashed. Is there a solution?
Buttonless? I'm not quite sure I understand this comment
